bibl.title: Papyrus in Classical Antiquity.
bibl.seg: Lewis Naphtali, Papyrus in Classical Antiquity.
Oxford, Clarendon Press, 1974, 8Â°, viii-152 pp. et 8 pll.

C.R. par Roger S. Bagnall, CP 73 (1978) pp. 166-168. - Bernard Boyaval, REA 77 (1975) p. 315. - Alan K. Bowman, JHS 96 (1976) p. 265 [concerne aussi: Orsolina Montevecchi, La Papirologia (Torino, 1973)]. - B. Boyaval, REA 77 (1975) p. 315. - W. Derouau, EtCl 43 (1975) pp. 445-446. - Jean Irigoin, RPhil 3e s., 51 (1977) p. 107. - Henri Leclercq, BibO 33 (1976) pp. 29-30. - Jean Lenaerts, AntCl 44 (1975) pp. 757-758. - Hubert Metzger, AnzAW 30 (1977) col. 104. - Livia Migliardi Zingale, Maia N.S., 32 (1980) pp. 215-216. - Georges Nachtergael, ChrEg 49 (1974) No. 98, pp. 404-405. - W. S. M. Nicoll, CR N.S., 27 (1977) pp. 86-87. - John F. Oates, BASP 13 (1976) pp. 135-136. - H. W. Parke, Hermathena 122 (1977) p. 75. - Jean A. Straus, RBPhil 54 (1976) pp. 971-972. - Marcia E. Weinstein, CW 69 (1976) pp. 456-457. - Yaginuma, Journal of Classical Studies 26 (1978) pp. 109-111.
